LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Pale.label: pale ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Pale.description: A slab-like facility, can automatically form a mana ball and actively attack nearby enemies.
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Pale_Gun.label: pale ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Pale_Proj.label: pale ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Shatter.label: shatter ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Shatter.description: A slab-like facility, can automatically form a mana ball and actively attack nearby enemies. It can cause an explosion and usually powerful enough to blow a person apart.
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Shatter_Gun.label: shatter ball
LanguageData.WNA_Turret_Shatter_Proj.label: shatter ball
